name: Rhythmy ♫
description:
Controls: Use your mouse to move and dodge everything! (hitboxes aren't available yet in this build)

"Rhythmy ♫" is a new arcade-style rhythm bullet hell game actually in development. (For PC/Mac/Linux)

Our goal is to achieve a fun/enjoyable bullet hell experience , with a little taste of music!
We're collaborating with some artists that are allowing us to use their creation into our game, and we hope you'll like them as much as we do!

This demo that you'll be able to check, is an early prototype of the first playable level, which will most likely be a tutorial.

Feel free to follow the development of the game!

Discord: https://discord.gg/GBpdBy4
Twitter: https://twitter.com/gamerhythmy
